page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Skelton and district has almost no unemployment. Main sources of employ- ment are farming, BBC World Service Transmitter, small building firms (often a family concern with perhaps one other employee), agricultural contracting and services, lorry driving, estate and forestry work, local pottery and school employees. Farming is usually just the family but there might be one or two farmhands as well. Two veterinary surgeons serve the area. From our survey we found that 50% work away from Skelton often at a great distance eg. Glasgow or Workington whereas others not so far away eg. Penrith or Carlisle.
